topic: Daily highlights and chronological coverage of the 2025 World Athletics Championships.
evaluation: This cluster successfully forms a highly continuous and developmental narrative tracking the World Athletics Championships 2025 from its opening day (September 13th) to its conclusion (September 21st). Each article provides chronological updates on various events, athlete performances, and daily summaries, ensuring a logical timeline and significant coverage. All articles are strictly relevant to the overarching championship event, making the group highly synthesizable into a comprehensive daily recap. No articles were deemed noisy.
